"Blood Work" is another classic detective movie that follows the adventures of renowned criminal psychologist Sherlock Holmes and his loyal partner Dr. John Watson as they solve crimes and uncover secrets. The film stars James Badge Dale and Anthony Anderson as Sherlock Holmes and Dr. John Watson, respectively. 

Overall, both "The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes" and "Blood Work" are classic detective movies that follow the adventures of renowned criminal psychologist Sherlock Holmes and his loyal partner Dr. John Watson as they solve crimes and uncover secrets. Both films feature excellent performances from their casts, making them enjoyable and engaging watch experiences for audiences of all ages.

" Hitch " is a romantic comedy film directed by Martin Brest. The film stars Tom Hanks as Andrew 'Andy' Dufresne, an escaped convict who enlists the help, both moral and financial, of his fellow inmate, con man Robert Strumple (played by Steve Martin). As Andy tries to start life anew in a New Hampshire prison, he struggles to maintain his status as the most successful con man in American history.
